mapper.select: SELECT NULL AS transferNo, #{payYm} AS payYm, ps.emp_id AS empId, e.bank_code AS bankCode, e.account_no AS accountNo, e.name AS accountHolder, ps.net_pay AS netPay, p.company_code AS companyCode FROM payroll p JOIN payroll_summary ps ON ps.payroll_no = p.payroll_no AND ps.company_code = p.company_code JOIN emp e ON e.emp_id = ps.emp_id AND e.company_code = ps.company_code WHERE p.year_month = #{payYm} AND p.company_code = #{companyCode} AND p.status = 'CONFIRMED' ORDER BY e.bank_code, e.name
